casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jermaine L. HOLLOWAY. No. 259P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. Jermaine L. Holloway, for Holloway, Jermaine L. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Wallace W. Bradsher, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion *856The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of July 2015 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
